title: Plunder of Peach and Plum - 桃李劫;

sources.title: Plunder of Peach and Plum - 桃李劫;
sources.description: Directed by and starring Yuan Muzhi. This 1934 movie details the plight of college graduates determined to improve China, despite the corruption and injustice of the day. 1934, Diantong, Shanghai, B&W, Mandarin Chinese. Also known as "The Fate of Graduates."
